name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 停止 Yahoo TW 自動播放

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: Video on TW yahoo news will be autoplayed, this extension try to stop autoplay
short.en: Video on yahoo news will be autoplayed, this extension try to stop autoplay

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e: 停止 Yahoo TW 上面的自動影片播放，使用者仍然可以手動繼續播放影片
long.en: Video on TW yahoo news will be autoplayed, this extension try to stop autoplay
